description: This file defines the CartProvider class, which manages the shopping cart state for a restaurant frontend application. It includes methods to add, remove, decrease items and compute totals such as subtotal, taxes, service charge, and overall total.

classes.name: CartProvider
classes.description: A class that manages the state of the shopping cart, including items, totals, and updates, extending Flutter's ChangeNotifier to notify UI of state changes.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a MenuItemModel to the cart; increments quantity if already present.

methods.name: decrease
methods.description: Decreases the quantity of a given MenuItemModel in the cart; removes it if quantity reaches zero.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes a MenuItemModel from the cart.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears all items from the cart.
